block_feature_one.title: Unlock Proplix's advantages
block_feature_one.description: Your trusted real estate partner in every transaction.

Feature.Explore Problixs 2 million homes and unc: Find the right property & unlock financing—fast. Explore thousands of resale and ready-to-move units across Egypt. Calculate your mortgage on the spot and connect with verified agents.
Feature.Discover a rental youll love on Problix: Live where it fits your lifestyle. Use Proplix's powerful filters to browse furnished or unfurnished rentals by area, budget, or amenities—with verified listings only.
Feature.List sell thrive with our top-notch rea: Sell smarter, not harder. Whether you're an owner or agent, list your unit on Egypt's growing real estate network—with full support from our partner agents and smart lead tools.

vid.description2: Your premier partner in real estate. Transforming properties into dreams. Let us guide you home with expertise.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: In these terms and conditions for users ("Terms of Use"), the terms "we," "our," "us" refer to Proplix Technologies LLC, including its employees, officers, agents, affiliates, and assigned parties. "Website" refers to Proplix.com.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.content: By accessing or using this Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy (together, the "Terms"), as well as all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these Terms, your only option is to stop using the Website immediately.

eligibility.title: Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.content: You may not use the Website and may not accept these Terms if: (a) You are under 18 years of age, or (b) You are legally prohibited from accessing or using the Website under the laws of your country.

effective.title: Effective Date
effective.content: These Terms take effect the moment you start using the Website.

license.title: License Grant
license.content:
You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the Website for personal, non-commercial use only. This license does not include any rights to:
• Modify, copy, or reproduce the content
• Use the content for any commercial or public purpose
• Attempt to reverse engineer any software on the Website
• Remove copyright or proprietary notices
• Mirror or transfer the Website content to another server

restrictions.title: Prohibited Activities
restrictions.content:
You agree not to:
• Use bots or scraping tools to access or index content
• Disrupt the normal functioning of the Website
• Create competing platforms using content from Proplix.com
• Send spam or mass unsolicited communications
• Violate any applicable laws or third-party rights
• Upload malicious content or viruses
• Reproduce or republish content without written permission

termination.title: License Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to restrict or revoke your access at any time. If you breach these Terms, your license is automatically terminated and you must delete any materials you downloaded.

platform.title: Platform Nature
platform.content: Proplix is a real estate marketplace, not a brokerage. We provide a platform for property listings and do not participate in property transactions.

verification.title: Information Verification
verification.content: Listings are created by third-party agents and are not verified by us. We do not guarantee their accuracy. You are responsible for verifying all property information, conducting inspections, and seeking legal advice before making any transaction.

compliance.title: Legal Compliance
compliance.content: You must use the Website in good faith and in compliance with all applicable laws.

limitations.title: Liability Limitations
limitations.content:
We are not liable for any loss or damages, including:
• Data loss
• Business interruption
• Profits loss
• Computer viruses or malware

communications.title: Third-Party Communications
communications.content: We are not liable for communication between users and agents, or inaccuracies in property listings. You may not use the Website for business or commercial purposes without express consent.

disclaimer.title: General Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Website is provided "as is." We make no warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the Website or its content.

ownership.title: Content Ownership
ownership.content: All content on Proplix.com is the property of Proplix Technologies LLC or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.

usage.title: Usage Rights
usage.content: No content from the Website may be copied, reused, or republished without our prior written consent.

trademarks.title: Trademarks
trademarks.content: All trademarks, service marks, and logos are owned by us or our partners and may not be used without permission.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt. Any legal disputes will be resolved in the courts of Egypt.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your personal information. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect, use, store, and protect your data. By using our Website, you consent to the collection and use of your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions, concerns, or wish to report a listing, please contact us at: support@proplix.com

personal.title: Personal Information You Provide
personal.content:
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us including:
• Name, email address, phone number, nationality, address, date of birth
• ID/passport documents for verification purposes
• Your interests, budget preferences, and communication records
• Any messages you send through contact forms, WhatsApp, email, or phone calls

property.title: Property-Related Data
property.content:
We collect information related to your property activities on our platform:
• Property search history and saved listings
• Property inquiries and viewing requests
• Preferences for property types, locations, and budget ranges
• Interaction history with property agents and developers

technical.title: Technical & Usage Data
technical.content:
We automatically collect technical information when you use our platform:
• IP address, device identifiers, and browser type
• Referral URLs and platform usage logs
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies
• Performance data and error reports

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Sources
thirdParty.content:
We may receive information about you from external sources including:
• Property brokers, agents, and developers
• Business partners and service providers
• Analytics providers and advertising platforms
• Banks and financial institutions (for mortgage services)

services.title: Service Provision
services.content:
We use your information to provide and maintain our core services:
• Creating and managing your account
• Processing property inquiries and search requests
• Connecting you with relevant property agents and developers
• Facilitating property viewings and transactions

communication.title: Communications & Marketing
communication.content:
We use your data for communication purposes including:
• Sending service notifications and property alerts
• Providing customer support and responding to inquiries
• Marketing communications about new properties and services
• Mortgage service offers through our partners (if applicable)

improvement.title: Platform Improvement
improvement.content:
We analyze your usage data to enhance our platform:
• Improving website performance, content, and usability
• Personalizing your experience and property recommendations
• Developing new features and services
• Conducting market research and analytics

legal.title: Legal & Security
legal.content:
We process your data for legal and security purposes:
• Detecting and preventing fraud and security threats
• Enforcing our terms of service and policies
• Complying with legal, tax, and regulatory obligations
• Protecting our rights and the rights of our users

dataSharing.title: Who We Share Your Data With

agents.title: Property Professionals
agents.content:
We share your information with property professionals when you express interest in their listings:
• Real estate agents and brokers
• Property developers and landlords
• Property management companies
• Licensed real estate professionals on our platform

partners.title: Service Partners
partners.content:
We may share your data with trusted service providers:
• Mortgage providers and financial institutions
• IT service providers and cloud hosting companies
• Marketing and analytics partners
• Customer support and communication platforms

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content:
We may disclose your information when required by law:
• Legal or regulatory authorities
• Government agencies and law enforcement
• Courts and legal proceedings
• Tax authorities and financial regulators

business.title: Business Transfers
business.content:
Your data may be transferred in business transactions:
• Mergers, acquisitions, or asset sales
• Business restructuring or reorganization
• Assignment of rights or obligations
• Due diligence processes (with appropriate safeguards)

security.title: Security Measures
security.content:
We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:
• Data encryption in transit and at rest
• Secure servers and protected databases
• Access controls limited to authorized personnel only
• Regular security audits and monitoring
• Incident response procedures for potential breaches

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content:
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for:
• Providing our services to you
• Meeting legal, tax, and accounting requirements
• Resolving disputes and enforcing agreements
• Responding to complaints and customer inquiries
The retention period varies based on data type and legal obligations.

transfers.title: International Transfers
transfers.content:
Your data may be processed in countries outside your residence:
• We implement appropriate safeguards for cross-border transfers
• Standard contractual clauses and adequacy decisions
• Binding corporate rules and certification mechanisms
• Regular monitoring of transfer security and compliance

access.title: Access & Information Rights
access.content:
You have the right to access and receive information about your data:
• Request a copy of your personal data
• Obtain information about how we process your data
• Receive data in a structured, machine-readable format
• Request details about data sharing and transfers

control.title: Control & Correction Rights
control.content:
You can control and correct your personal information:
• Update or correct inaccurate data
• Request deletion of your personal data
• Restrict or object to certain types of processing
• Withdraw consent for consent-based processing
• Opt-out of marketing communications

exercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
exercise.content:
To exercise your privacy rights, you can:
• Email us at privacy@proplix.com
• Use the privacy settings in your account
• Contact our customer support team
• Submit requests through our privacy portal
We will respond to your requests within applicable legal timeframes.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:
• Remember your preferences and settings
• Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
• Personalize your experience and advertisements
• Improve our platform performance
You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our Cookie Policy.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Proplix does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18 years of age. If you believe we have inadvertently collected information from a child, please contact us immediately at privacy@proplix.com and we will take steps to delete such information.

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will post any updated policy on this page with a revised "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our platform after changes become effective constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content:
If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
📧 Email: privacy@proplix.com
📞 Phone: [Phone Number]
📬 Mail: [Physical Address]
We will respond to your inquiries promptly and in accordance with applicable laws.
